docs.title: Home
docs.text:
reve

reve is a mobile app that collects and repackages fast-changing offline data for online access. This allows users to stay up-to-date with real-time information that may not be readily available online, making it a valuable tool for quick and relevant access to data.

docs.title: Privacy Policy for "Reve" Mobile App
docs.text: Effective Date: 14 October 2023

docs.title: 1. Introduction
docs.text: Welcome to "Reve". This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our mobile application. By using "Reve", you agree to the terms and practices described in this policy.

docs.title: 2.1. Google Authentication
docs.text: When you use "Reve" and choose to log in using Google authentication, we collect certain information from your Google account, which may include your name, email address, and profile picture. We use this information to create and manage your "Reve" account and provide a personalized experience.

docs.title: 2.2. User-Provided Information
docs.text: "Reve" may also collect data you voluntarily provide, such as preferences, settings, and feedback, to enhance your app experience.

docs.title: 3.1. Account Management
docs.text: We use Google-authenticated data to create and manage your "Reve" account, ensuring a secure and convenient login process.

docs.title: 3.2. Personalization
docs.text: Your data is used to customize your in-app experience, providing you with content and features tailored to your preferences.

docs.title: 3.3. Communications
docs.text: We may use your email address to send you important updates, notifications, and responses to your inquiries.

docs.title: 4.1. Data Security
docs.text: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.

docs.title: 4.2. Third-Party Services
docs.text: While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee the security of information shared through third-party services such as Google authentication. Your use of these services is subject to their respective privacy policies.

docs.title: 5.1. Third Parties
docs.text: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties except as necessary to provide you with the services and features of "Reve." These third parties are required to protect your data in compliance with this Privacy Policy.

docs.title: 6.1. Account Control
docs.text: You can modify your account settings, including revoking access to the app, through your Google account settings.

docs.title: 6.2. Opting Out
docs.text: You may opt out of email communications from us at any time.

docs.title: 7.1. Notification
docs.text: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices. We will notify you of significant changes through in-app notifications or by other means.

docs.title: 8. Contact Us
docs.text: By using "Reve", you agree to the practices outlined in this Privacy Policy. Please review this policy periodically for updates. Your continued use of the app constitutes your acceptance of any changes made to this policy.

docs.title: Terms of Use for "Reve" Mobile App
docs.text: Effective Date: 14 October 2023

docs.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
docs.text: By using the "Reve" mobile app, you agree to abide by the following Terms of Use. If you do not agree with these terms, please refrain from using the app.

docs.title: 2. User Eligibility
docs.text: You must be at least 18 years of age to use "Reve." By using the app, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.

docs.title: 3. User Accounts
docs.text:
3.1. Account Creation: You may be required to create an account to access certain features of "Reve." You are responsible for the information you provide during account creation and must ensure it is accurate and up-to-date.

3.2. Account Security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account credentials, including your username and password. Any activity on your account is your responsibility.

docs.title: 4. User Conduct
docs.text:
You agree to use "Reve" in compliance with the following guidelines:

4.1. Compliance with Laws: You will use the app in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

4.2. Respect for Others: You will not engage in any activity that is harmful, offensive, or violates the rights and privacy of others.

4.3. Prohibited Activities: You will not engage in unauthorized access, use, or distribution of the app or its content.

docs.title: 5. Privacy
docs.text: Your use of "Reve" is subject to our Privacy Policy, which outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data. By using the app, you consent to the practices described in the Privacy Policy.

docs.title: 6. Intellectual Property
docs.text:
6.1. App Ownership: "Reve" and its content are protected by intellectual property laws and belong to the app's developers.

6.2. Limited License: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use "Reve" for personal, non-commercial purposes.

docs.title: 7. Changes to the App
docs.text: We may update, modify, or discontinue "Reve" at any time without notice. We are not liable for any potential loss resulting from such actions.

docs.title: 8. Termination
docs.text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to "Reve" if you violate these Terms of Use or engage in any activity that is harmful to the app, its users, or its developers.

docs.title: 9. Disclaimer of Warranties
docs.text: "Reve" is provided on an "as is" basis, and we make no warranties or guarantees regarding its accuracy, reliability, or availability.

docs.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
docs.text: We are not liable for any damages, losses, or injuries arising from your use of "Reve." Your use of the app is at your own risk.

docs.title: 11. Contact Us
docs.text: By using "Reve," you agree to these Terms of Use. Please review them periodically for updates. Your continued use of the app constitutes your acceptance of any changes made to these terms.
